mapper.select: SELECT cno,name,address,phone,msg,image,(SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(price)) FROM campsite2 cs WHERE cs.cno=c.cno) as mprice,num FROM (SELECT cno,name,address,phone,msg,image,rownum as num FROM (SELECT cno,name,address,phone,msg,image FROM camp2 ORDER BY cno ASC)) c WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT cno,name,address,phone,msg,hit,image,mprice,num FROM (SELECT cno,name,address,phone,msg,hit,image,mprice,rownum as num FROM (SELECT cno,name,address,phone,msg,hit,image,(SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(price)) FROM campsite2 cs WHERE cs.cno=camp2.cno) as mprice FROM camp2 WHERE (SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(price)) FROM campsite2 cs WHERE cs.cno=camp2.cno) BETWEEN #{spricefd} AND #{epricefd} AND (SELECT COUNT(sDate) FROM reserve2 WHERE camp2.cno=reserve2.rno AND sDate BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} AND type='c') = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(eDate) FROM reserve2 WHERE camp2.cno=reserve2.rno AND eDate BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} AND type='c') = 0
AND address LIKE '%'||#{state}||'%'
AND name LIKE '%'||#{campfd}||'%'
ORDER BY cno ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}

SELECT CEIL(COUNT(*)/4.0) FROM camp2 WHERE (SELECT MIN(TO_NUMBER(price)) FROM campsite2 cs WHERE cs.cno=camp2.cno) BETWEEN #{spricefd} AND #{epricefd}
AND (SELECT COUNT(sDate) FROM reserve2 WHERE camp2.cno=reserve2.rno AND sDate BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} AND type='c') = 0 AND (SELECT COUNT(eDate) FROM reserve2 WHERE camp2.cno=reserve2.rno AND eDate BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} AND type='c') = 0
AND address LIKE '%'||#{state}||'%'
AND name LIKE '%'||#{campfd}||'%'
SELECT tno,name,address,link,image FROM tour2 WHERE address LIKE '%'||#{addr}||'%' ORDER BY tno ASC FETCH FIRST 6 ROWS ONLY

SELECT no,subject,sno,type,id,TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD')as dbday,hit,num FROM (SELECT no,subject,sno,type,id,regdate,hit,rownum as num FROM (SELECT no,subject,sno,type,id,regdate,hit FROM review2 WHERE sno=#{cno} AND type=#{type} ORDER BY no DESC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
